condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: At least 50% of out-of-school vulnerable girls and boys in selected localities have access to formal and non-formal inclusive and equitable education opportunities

description.narrative: Over 1.8 million previously out of school children from rural areas, nomads, IDP, emergency affected, refugees and children with disability have been supported by UNICEF and enabled to access education in formal and non-formal basic schools, representing a reduction in OOSC by 58 per cent from 3,097,328. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/03/2018

title.narrative: Number of children that received subsidies, scholarships, grants or social assistance from UNICEF to attend school, by gender
